trans-unit.source: Represents a row of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> that can contain controls.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> 的行，该行能够包含控件。

trans-unit.source: The containing <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 作为容器的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> class, specifying the containing <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> 类的新实例，指定作为容器的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />, including its nonclient elements, in pixels, relative to the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> 的大小和位置（以像素为单位），包括其相对于父控件的非客户端元素。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the size and location.
trans-unit.target: 表示大小和位置的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: While the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.DisplayRectangle%2A> property gets only the client elements of the control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds%2A> property gets the nonclient and client elements.
trans-unit.target: 虽然<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.DisplayRectangle%2A>属性可获取只有客户端的控件元素<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds%2A>属性可获取非客户端和客户端元素。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to be dragged and dropped into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
trans-unit.target: 要拖放到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> can be dragged and dropped into a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指示能否将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 拖放到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there is enough space in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> to receive the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> 中有足够的空间接收 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the controls in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> 中的控件。

trans-unit.source: An array of controls.
trans-unit.target: 控件数组。

trans-unit.source: Gets the space, in pixels, that is specified by default between controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件之间默认指定的间距（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> that represents the default space between controls.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件之间默认间距的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the internal spacing, in pixels, of the contents of a control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件内容的内部间距（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> that represents the internal spacing of the contents of a control.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件内容内部间距的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件的显示区域。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the size and location.
trans-unit.target: 表示大小和位置的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: While the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds%2A> property gets the nonclient and client elements, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.DisplayRectangle%2A> property gets only the client elements of the control.
trans-unit.target: 虽然<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds%2A>属性获取非客户端和客户端元素<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.DisplayRectangle%2A>属性可获取只有客户端的控件的元素。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow>引用。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以由其他对象多次调用。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现详细信息<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the control's layout engine.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件的布局引擎的实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> for the control's contents.
trans-unit.target: 控件内容的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the space between controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件之间的空间。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> representing the space between controls.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件之间的间距的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />。

trans-unit.source: The original value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds" /> 属性的原始值。

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds" /> 属性的新值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnBoundsChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnBoundsChanged%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnBoundsChanged(System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Rectangle)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnBoundsChanged(System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Rectangle)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnBoundsChanged(System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Rectangle)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnBoundsChanged(System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Rectangle)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: The control that was added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
trans-unit.target: 已添加到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> 中的控件。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index representing the position of the added control.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的索引，表示所添加的控件的位置。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlAdded%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlAdded%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlAdded(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlAdded(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlAdded(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlAdded(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: The control that was removed from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
trans-unit.target: 已从 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> 移除的控件。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index representing the position of the removed control.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的索引，表示所移除的控件的位置。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlRemoved%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlRemoved%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlRemoved(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlRemoved(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlRemoved(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlRemoved(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnLayout%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnLayout%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Orientation" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Orientation" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnOrientationChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnOrientationChanged%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnOrientationChanged" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnOrientationChanged" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnOrientationChanged" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnOrientationChanged" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: Gets the layout direction of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> relative to its containing <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> 相对于包含它的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> 的布局方向。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets padding within the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件内的空白。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> representing the control's internal spacing characteristics.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件的内部间距特征的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />，它包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />。
